_comment: 1. This json file contains the Entity ID and Entityname to generate Dbus path.
2. This json file is geing read and prepare std::map which is used to generate path.

3. When PLDM daemon starts, PLDM will get PDR from remote terminus and based on received PDR and prepared std::map data PLDM will generate DBus path to expose the system connection architecture to the redfish client. e.g system/motherboard/chassis/dcm
